Changelog
=========

This product adds a field to folders so you can define extra.css you want to load for content in that folder. Requires medialog.subskins 4.1b3 or higher and Products.PloneSubSkins 4.5. You have to enable the subskinsloader viewlet by going to /@@manage-viewlets. Send a mail to espen at medialog dot no for help (this product is working now, but I have not made a how to yet.)

0.2
----------------------
Added settings for all subskins colours and widths

0.1
----------------------
First version
